snippet: If the full European Parliament backs her next week, Danièle Nouy of France will take over the thorny job of overseeing the largest banks in the euro zone.
lead_paragraph: If the full European Parliament backs her next week, Danièle Nouy of France will take over the thorny job of overseeing the largest banks in the euro zone.

headline.main: Nominee for E.U. Bank Regulator Moves Closer to Post
headline.print_headline: Nominee for E.U. Ban Regulator Moves Closer to Post
